1.text: This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, he made him in God’s likeness.

2.text: He created them male and female, and blessed them, and called their name “Adam,” in the day when they were created.

3.text: Adam lived one hundred thirty years, and became the father of a son in his own likeness, after his image, and named him Seth.

4.text: The days of Adam after he became the father of Seth were eight hundred years, and he became the father of sons and daughters.

5.text: All the days that Adam lived were nine hundred thirty years, then he died.

6.text: Seth lived one hundred five years, and became the father of Enosh.

7.text: Seth lived after he became the father of Enosh eight hundred seven years, and became the father of sons and daughters.

8.text: All the days of Seth were nine hundred twelve years, then he died.

9.text: Enosh lived ninety years, and became the father of Kenan.

10.text: Enosh lived after he became the father of Kenan, eight hundred fifteen years, and became the father of sons and daughters.

11.text: All the days of Enosh were nine hundred five years, then he died.

12.text: Kenan lived seventy years, and became the father of Mahalalel.

13.text: Kenan lived after he became the father of Mahalalel eight hundred forty years, and became the father of sons and daughters

14.text: and all the days of Kenan were nine hundred ten years, then he died.

15.text: Mahalalel lived sixty-five years, and became the father of Jared.

16.text: Mahalalel lived after he became the father of Jared eight hundred thirty years, and became the father of sons and daughters.

17.text: All the days of Mahalalel were eight hundred ninety-five years, then he died.

18.text: Jared lived one hundred sixty-two years, and became the father of Enoch.

19.text: Jared lived after he became the father of Enoch eight hundred years, and became the father of sons and daughters.

20.text: All the days of Jared were nine hundred sixty-two years, then he died.

21.text: Enoch lived sixty-five years, and became the father of Methuselah.

22.text: Enoch walked with God after he became the father of Methuselah three hundred years, and became the father of sons and daughters.

23.text: All the days of Enoch were three hundred sixty-five years.

24.text: Enoch walked with God, and he was not, for God took him.

25.text: Methuselah lived one hundred eighty-seven years, and became the father of Lamech.

26.text: Methuselah lived after he became the father of Lamech seven hundred eighty-two years, and became the father of sons and daughters.

27.text: All the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty-nine years, then he died.

28.text: Lamech lived one hundred eighty-two years, and became the father of a son,

29.text: and he named him Noah, saying, “This same will comfort us in our work and in the toil of our hands, because of the ground which Yahweh has cursed.”

30.text: Lamech lived after he became the father of Noah five hundred ninety-five years, and became the father of sons and daughters.

31.text: All the days of Lamech were seven hundred seventy-seven years, then he died.

32.text: Noah was five hundred years old, and Noah became the father of Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
